# Alchemy Crafting

Proficiency with **Alchemist's Supplies** allows you to produce useful concoctions, such as potions and oils.

## Tools & Contents
**Alchemist's Supplies** include two glass beakers, a metal frame to hold a beaker over an open flame, a glass stirring rod, a small mortar and pestle, and a pouch of common alchemical ingredients (salt, distilled alcohol, powdered iron, purified water).

## Crafting Basics
To craft an item, you must have the recipe, the tools, and the specific ingredients. You spend time and gold (generic mundane materials) to create the item.

### Learning Recipes
*   **Starting:** Gain 3 Common recipes when you gain tool proficiency.
*   **Leveling Up:** When your Proficiency Bonus increases, you learn 1 new recipe of an appropriate tier.
*   **Researching:** You can spend time and gold to discover new recipes found in the world.
    *   **Common:** 1 workday, 50 gp
    *   **Uncommon:** 5 workdays, 250 gp
    *   **Rare:** 10 workdays, 500 gp
    *   **Very Rare:** 30 workdays, 1,000 gp

## Common Recipes (DC 10)
*Cost: 25 gp + ingredients. Time: 1 workday.*

| Item | Description | Ingredients |
|---|---|---|
| **Alchemist's Fire** | Thrown (20ft). Hit: 1d4 fire damage at start of turn. DC 10 Dex to extinguish. | Fire Elemental Ember, Flask of Oil |
| **Smokebomb** | Thrown (30ft). Heavily obscured (10ft radius), lightly obscured (+5ft) for 1 min. | Air Elemental Whisp, Ashblossom |
| **Ink** | Standard writing ink. | Charcoal |
| **Blasting Powder** | Explodes when ignited (5ft radius). DC 13 Dex save for 3d6 bludgeoning. Can bind multiple (max 10d6, 20ft radius). | Ashblossom, Charcoal |
| **Potion of Climbing** | Gain climb speed equal to walk speed for 1 hour. Adv. on Athletics (Climb). | Giant Wolf Spider Hair, Earth Elemental Dust |
| **Potion of Swimming** | Gain swim speed equal to walk speed for 1 hour. Adv. on Athletics (Swim). | Quipper Scale (x3), Water Elemental Droplet |
| **Soothsalts** | Adv. on Int checks for 1d4 hours. DC 15 Con save or 1 exhaustion per dose. | Soothsalt Geode |
| **Vial of Acid** | Thrown (20ft). Hit: 2d6 acid damage. | Gray Ooze Residue, Crawler Mucus |

## Uncommon Recipes (DC 15)
*Cost: 100 gp + ingredients. Time: 3 workdays.*

| Item | Description | Ingredients |
|---|---|---|
| **Ink (Rare)** | For Lvl 1-5 spell writing. | Charcoal, Finely Ground Iron |
| **Oil of Slipperiness** | *Freedom of Movement* (8h) or *Grease* effect (10ft square, 8h). | Flask of Oil, Crawler Mucus, Amphibian Saliva |
| **Potion of Animal Friendship** | Cast *Animal Friendship* (DC 13) at will for 1 hour. | Cat's Tongue, Quipper Scale |
| **Potion of Fire Breath** | Bonus action exhale fire (30ft). DC 13 Dex save for 4d6 fire damage. Lasts 3 uses or 1h. | Ashblossom, Remorhaz Ichor |
| **Potion of Growth** | *Enlarge* effect (1d4 hours, no concentration). | Sourgrass, Rowan Berry, Giant Wolf Spider Hair |
| **Potion of Giant Strength** | Set Str Score for 1h: Hill (21), Frost/Stone (23), Fire (25), Cloud (27), Storm (29). | Frost Lichen, Giant Fingernail (type matches) |
| **Potion of Resistance** | Resistance to one damage type for 1 hour. | Hagfinger + Special Ingredient |
| **Potion of Waterbreathing** | Breathe underwater for 1 hour. | Gillyweed, Hagfinger |

*Resistance Ingredients: Acid (Crawler Mucus), Cold (Frost Lichen), Fire (Ashblossom), Force (Amphibian Saliva), Lightning (Lightning Moss), Necrotic (Nightshade), Poison (Rowanberry), Psychic (Mindflayer Stinkhorn), Radiant (Sourgrass), Thunder (Singing Nettle).*

## Rare Recipes (DC 20)
*Cost: 500 gp + ingredients. Time: 10 workdays.*

| Item | Description | Ingredients |
|---|---|---|
| **Ink (Very Rare)** | For Lvl 6-8 spell writing. | Charcoal, Finely Ground Iron, Willowshade Fruit |
| **Invisible Ink** | Only visible with magic or mild acid. | Pixie's Parasol, Ink |
| **Midnight Oil** | Light source (5ft bright/5ft dim) for 8h. Resting in light gives Long Rest benefits for light activity. | Flask of Oil, Pixie's Parasol |
| **Oil of Dragon's Bane** | Coats 1 weapon or 3 ammo (1 use each). +6d6 damage vs Dragons. Lasts 1h. | Dragon's Blood, Wyvern Poison |
| **Potion of Gaseous Form** | *Gaseous Form* effect (1 hour, no concentration). | Ectoplasm, Singing Nettle |
| **Oil of Etherealness** | *Etherealness* effect for 1 hour. Takes 10 mins to apply. | Ectoplasm, Flask of Oil |
| **Potion of Clairvoyance** | *Clairvoyance* effect. | Morning Dew, Mandrake Root |
| **Potion of Diminution** | *Reduce* effect (1d4 hours, no concentration). | Pixie's Parasol, Moonstalker |
| **Potion of Heroism** | 10 Temp HP and *Bless* effect (no concentration) for 1 hour. | Hagfinger, Cat's Tongue |
| **Potion of Invulnerability** | Resistance to all damage for 1 minute. | Metal struck by lightning |
| **Potion of Mind Reading** | *Detect Thoughts* (DC 13). | Mindflayer Stinkhorn, Moonstalker |

## Very Rare Recipes (DC 25)
*Cost: 1,000 gp + ingredients. Time: 30 workdays.*

| Item | Description | Ingredients |
|---|---|---|
| **Ink (Legendary)** | For Lvl 9 spell writing. | Charcoal, Finely Ground Iron, Willowshade Oil (x3) |
| **Oil of Sharpness** | Coats weapon/5 ammo. +3 bonus to attack/damage for 1 hour. | Ankheg Ichor, Silverthorn |
| **Potion of Flying** | Fly speed equals walk speed (hover) for 1 hour. | Air Elemental Whisp, Singing Nettle |
| **Potion of Invisibility** | Invisible for 1 hour. Ends if you attack/cast. | Skulk Fingernail, Fairy Stool |
| **Potion of Longevity** | Physical age reduced by 1d6+6 years (min 13). 10% cumulative chance of aging instead. | Imp Heart, Red Amanita Mushroom |
| **Potion of Speed** | *Haste* effect (1 min, no concentration). | Eagle's Claw (x4), Lightning Moss, Sugar |
| **Potion of Truesight** | Truesight for 1 hour. | Fairy Stool, Nothic Tears |
